comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
Picture shows the British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, on the right, being introduced by the Governor of Tanganyika, H E Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, second from right, to a person unknown to me, presumably with his wife. Second from left is the Speaker of the Tanganyika Legislative Council, the Hon. A Y A Karimjee, OBE. On the extreme left is the Attorney-General, Mr J S R Cole, QC. 
The occasion is presumably the departure of Mr Macleod after the Constitutional Conference held in Dar es Salaam in March 1961.
